title: A Sight of Happiness!
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Eli-san. We lost at rock paper scissors and had to buy stuff in this cold weather, but you seem rather happy<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh? I- is that so? I’m the same as usual though?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Really? Maybe I was wrong?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Ah, this one….I wonder if it’s a limited edition….I also never saw this one before. It must be sold around this time only….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>….Eli-san, do you like chocolates?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh!? No, I don’t particularly….like….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>When you stare at it so intently you really can’t say otherwise huh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>….The truth is I do. That’s why when I go out shopping during these times it’s a bit more exciting….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That’s fine, you don’t have to hide it! Stores are basically packed with chocolates now. Since we’re here, let’s go buy some for everyone<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Th-, then I have some recommendations! Here, Riko!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, Eli-san seems even more happy than before!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
